scripts.build: node -e "console.log('No build step required; deploy ./public as-is.')"
scripts.deploy:preview:with-db: node scripts/resolve-wrangler-config.mjs && wrangler -c wrangler.resolved.toml deploy --env preview
scripts.db:migrate:local:with-db: node scripts/resolve-wrangler-config.mjs && wrangler -c wrangler.resolved.toml d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote:with-db: node scripts/resolve-wrangler-config.mjs && wrangler -c wrangler.resolved.toml d1 migrations apply DB --remote
